title: Trust Funds/Creation/Vacancy Relief Trust Fund and Risk Mitigation Trust Fund/Florida Housing Finance Corporation
subject: subject index

abstracts.abstract: Trust Funds/Creation/Vacancy Relief Trust Fund and Risk Mitigation Trust Fund/Florida Housing Finance Corporation;  Creates Vacancy Relief Trust Fund & Risk Mitigation Trust Fund within Florida Housing Finance Corporation for specified purpose; authorizes any unexpended balance at specified time to remain in such trust funds for certain purpose; provides for future review & termination or recreation of trust funds.
